name: Asteroid Avoider
description:
Warning! This game plays very poorly in-browser. Download for a faster experience.

You are a STARSHIP CAPTAIN, flying your incredible STARSHIP through a DANGEROUS ASTEROID FIELD. You must AVOID these ASTEROIDS as quickly as you can, whilst ACQUIRING the valuable SPACE COINS you come across.

Asteroid Avoider is a short minigame I made in DragonRuby. I made this game a while back and meant to turn it into more, but haven't had the inspiration to continue it. I might turn it into a more complete game in the future. For now though, it's playable as a mini-game! Try and get as many coins as you can, and good luck!
